sentences: Tämä ongelma on hyvin yksinkertainen ratkaista.
context: The word 'yksinkertainen' is a Finnish adjective that means simple, basic or plain. It declines based on case and number, as shown in the dictionary definition. The root of the word is 'yksin', meaning alone, and '-kertainen' is an adjectival suffix.  It can also mean one-time or unique, but those usages are less common. You will see different forms like 'yksinkertaiset' which is the plural nominative form.
